# Problem 1
## Instacart 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart") 
```

`r nrow(instacart)` 1384617 rows 
`r ncol(instacart)` 15 columns 

How many aisles are there, and which aisles are the most items ordered from?
There are `r nrow(distinct(instacart, aisle))` distinct aisles.

`r nrow(distinct(instacart, product_name))`

```{r}
instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle_id, aisle) %>%
  summarize (n = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```
